name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens

reviews.name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens
reviews.reviewText:
Great contrast and color, typical of a Zeiss lens. What amazes me is how sharp this lens is at corners, even in the extreme wide angle end (16mm). The distortion is superbly well controlled too.

The sharpness in the corner indicates that the lens is inherently free of severe distortions, because the interpolation performed to correct the distortion often loses resolution in doing so. Goes to show how much quality optic this lens really is!

Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Excellent Lens

reviews.name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens
reviews.reviewText:
Superb ....
Just purchased this lens on 11/20/14
Took it for ride this morning. Shot some landscape in Raw (A7r)
Very impressive resolution and color accuracy
A must have for Landscape users
Love the F4 at all zoom levels. Not too heavy either

.
reviews.title: Just Released in the USA

reviews.name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical if this lens would produce the goods on the A7R, it does!!!!
reviews.title: impressed!

reviews.name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice lens, I can give 9.5 out of 10 for the image quality of this lens, except for one little obvious defect: 90 percent of the area is very sharp except the very edge area has a bit of blur. There are also some distortion on the four corner too, but it's a ultra wide angle lens, and that cannot be avoid. I love this lens' exterior look and its build quality. The price is a bit high compare to sel2470z, probably the devaluation of Canadian dollars played some effect on pricing.
reviews.title: Great lens but expensive

reviews.name: Sony Alpha E-Mount Vario-Tessar T* FE 16-35mm f/4.0 ZA OSS Zoom Lens
reviews.reviewText: I have used this lens for landscape and closeup photos. Closeup very narrow/shallow depth @f/4 and great bokeh is an added greatness. For landscape great clarity out far and in close manual focus out to 3/4 way very easy on the A7s with aperture selection f/4-22 for great depth clarity.
reviews.title: GREAT LENS, GREAT GLASS, GREAT VALUE
